topics.body:
Oh BTW I'm trying to figure out how Equestrians of the fanfic should look like since it is anthro, but I don't want it like those 'human' anthro designs. I wanted something more like this: 
https://derpicdn.net/img/2014/6/24/660363/large.png
https://derpicdn.net/img/2014/2/3/542551/large.jpg

Having both of them mixed together would work, most female Equestrians would be around 5ft and most males would be the same aside from ponies like Big Mac who would be around 6ft in height. I'm trying to get a balance on their design for an artist so I can see if it'd work for the story.
